Reviews.Title: Olympus FE-340 is very user-friendly
Reviews.Author: TexasShopper
Reviews.Content: Olympus FE-340 has a good sized LCD, 5X zoom, and is very user-friendly specially for people who are simply point-and-shoot photographers.PROS: -- Camera has 5x zoom, looks solidly built, comes in great colors and  the control buttons are very intuitive. -- Has a Guide option which describes possible shooting scenarios  (like shooting something behind a glass, shooting with bright  backlight) and you only need to select which scenario applies and  the camera provides you with the optimal settings. You just select it,  then point and shoot. -- LCD screen is good sized and clear. -- Provides 4 different preview shots at once (splits LCD display in 4)  and gives you the option to select which shot looks best to you. -- Image quality is good. Nothing spectacular, just good.CONS: -- Only takes xD picture cards. -- No burst mode (this is the continuous shooting mode). -- Write speed and flash recycle time is very slow.If you like fast burst mode, faster write speed, and SD card compatible,try either Canon SD1000 or Casio EX-Z80.

Reviews.Title: awesome little camera
Reviews.Author: Jane Scanlon
Reviews.Content: My 12 year old daughter bought this with birthday money and just loves it. It is incredibly user friendly and takes amazing pics and video. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Olympus FE-340 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: AGM72
Reviews.Content: This is a nice camera, easy to use and durable. I really enjoy using it. One downside is the battery has to be removed and placed into a separate charger when charging. It would be much more convenient to plug the AC cord into the camera to charge it and less likely for me to lose the charger and have to purchase a new one.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: B. Kelsey "Swampthing"
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use and very compact. It was a great deal. I love this camera

Reviews.Title: You'll love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Denise D. Sprung
Reviews.Content: Olympus FE-340 8MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Red)Just love my little red Olympus camera.  I had previously owned an Olympus digital camera but was in need of one with updated features (optical zoom, larger view, slim body, lightweight, etc). In all ways this camera has met my complete satisfaction and was an excellent price on Amazon.  Very user friendly, takes great shots! Would recommend this camera to beginners and to those more experienced who wish to take along a compact excellent camera.

Reviews.Title: i love this camera SO much!
Reviews.Author: Michelle S (real name too revealing) "boot ju...
Reviews.Content: We go through about a camera a year (due to teen usage)so I tend not to spend a ton of money on one. I've hated every camera we've ever had and always wanted an Olympus. This camera has the funnest features, clearest pictures and frankly, if my son breaks THIS one I'm going to be so angry... and then come right back and get the exact same one again. The screen is crystal clear, everything is really easy to use and figure out. I can't reiterate enough- I love this camera.eta: i should note that we got the refurbished item and are just as happy as if we'd purchased the new one

Reviews.Title: Great small slim camera
Reviews.Author: E. Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for taking on a trip or just to take in your pocket. Great pics!I recomend this camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
8.0-megapixel CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 16 x 22-inch prints
5x image-stabilized optical zoom; Face Detection
Perfect Shot Preview mode
TruePic III image processor
Stores images on xD Picture Cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus FE-340 8MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Red)
